en.today: Reimagine your contribution to society this morning, dear Aries, as the Aquarius moon forms sweet connections with Neptune and Pluto. Consider how your dreams and actions can be used to create community and positive change. You'll have a chance to reinvent yourself when Jupiter aligns with Chiron and the nodes of fate, but these shifts should be based on strengthening your voice and intellect. Try to acknowledge how specific patterns have stunted your growth, making changes accordingly. Spread some love either online or within your social sphere later tonight when Luna and Venus form a harmonious aspect.

en.today: Give yourself permission to sleep in, move slowly, and prioritize softness, dear Leo, as the Aquarius moon aspects Neptune and Pluto early this morning. Cultivating balance is your number one goal, but be mindful to invest in healthy relationships as well. Now is the time to seek camaraderie that offers healing, setting boundaries against people or situations that conjure unease. Your world blossoms with beauty when Luna aligns with Venus later tonight, creating the perfect ambiance for romance or intensive self-care.

A sweet yet serious energy follows you when Luna aspects Venus tonight, asking you to reevaluate your boundaries and let love in.

en.today: A spiritually charged energy finds you this morning, dear Gemini, as the Aquarius moon aligns with Neptune and Pluto. You'll find healing through social interaction while Jupiter aspects Chiron and the nodes of fate. Try not to close yourself off to new faces, as opportunities could arise when you network. Now is also a good time to reevaluate your long-term goals, especially if you've felt stuck recently. Send some love out to the universe later tonight when Luna and Venus align.
